Name: Predator
Description: Powerful melee warrior.**Can attack ground units**

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Move Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Move Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.
Root.Name: Set Rally Point

Root.Tooltip: Allows Zealots to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases the movement speed of Zealots. Ability can only be used once every 10 seconds.
Root.Name: Charge

Root.Tooltip: Crystalline cell-structure hardens the body as well as allow augmentation to enhance abilities.
Root.Name: Crystal Infusion

Root.Tooltip:
Infuse this unit to enhance its abilities.

This **Predator** attacks 50% faster and has +10 Health.
Infusion is permanent
Root.Name: Berserker

Root.Tooltip:
Infusion effects:
- Is suicide unit.
- Deals damage equal to its own life.

Effect is permanent.
Root.Name: Tyrant

Root.Tooltip:
Infuse this unit to unlock new potential.

Turns this **Predator** into a suicide unit. Can deal damage equal to its own life, affecting everything in a small radius.
Infusion is permanent
Root.Name: Tyrant
